projects.name: VICARA 3.0 Mobile App - SlateARV Theme
projects.description: A mobile application tailored for children and young adults with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) who face communication challenges. This app integrates the Fitzgerald Color System, ensuring a structured and visual approach to language development. The design was shaped by FGDs with linguistics and psychology experts, creating a user-centric solution to bridge communication gaps and promote inclusivity.

projects.name: Comphy (Community Photography)
projects.description: Developed a community-based web app for a bootcamp final project, focused on photography. The platform connects enthusiasts to share, explore, and engage with visual content, highlighting teamwork in web development.

projects.name: Eksplor Laweyan App
projects.description: Developed a mobile app as part of my thesis, inspired by a research collaboration. The project began with UI/UX design and culminated in a solution aligned with SDG 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities. Designed on a grand scale, it focused on Kampung Batik Laweyan in Solo, aiming to promote sustainable urban development and cultural preservation through digitalization
